document_requirements.description: Director ID Document / Passport
Beneficial Owner ID Document / Passport
Copy of the Trust Deed or Founding Document; OR Letter of Authority issued and signed by the Master of the High Court
Trustee ID Document / Passport
Partner ID Document / Passport
Member ID Document / Passport
Authorised Representative ID Document / Passport
Certificate/ Notice of incorporation (CM1/ COR 14.1/ 14.3) or Certificate of change of name (CM9) or CIPC Registration certificate
Register of Directors and Officers (CM29) (where applicable)
Notice of Registered Office (CM22/ COR 21.1) or Notice of Trading/ Operating Address/ Change of address
Resolution/ minutes signed by Directors appointing authorized representatives (signatories)
Authorised signatories on company letterhead signed by Directors or Company Secretary
If ownership includes a related legal entity: that entity's registration docs and identity documents of beneficial owners in that entity
Founding/ Amended Statement or Certificate of Incorporation (CK1/2) (if member changed)
Notification of registered/ trading/ postal address
Resolution/ minutes signed by Members appointing authorized representatives (signatories)
Authorised signatories on letterhead signed by Members or Company Secretary
If ownership includes a related legal entity: that entity's registration docs and identity documents of beneficial owners in that entity
Copy of the partnership agreement
Founding Statement and/or Partnership Agreement
Trust Deed or Partnership Agreement of legal persons who are partners (incl. en commandite and silent partners)
Notification of registered and trading address or document confirming registered address
Resolution/ minutes signed by Partners appointing an authorized representative (signatory)
Authorised signatories on the Partnership’s letterhead signed by Partners
If partnership has a related legal entity: that entity's registration docs and identity documents of beneficial owners in that entity
Income Tax registration confirmation (ITSA/ IT34/ Tax Compliance Certificate) OR letter confirming not registered for tax with reason
Mandate/ minutes/ resolution signed by all trustees confirming authority of person(s) to act
If ownership includes a related legal entity: that entity's registration docs and identity documents of beneficial owners in that entity
Founding document or Constitution in terms of which the entity was founded/ created/ registered
A document indicating the authorised signatories on the legal entity's official letterhead

Details of Executive Committee or the Office Bearers or Managing Officials (e.g. President, Vice President, Chairperson, Assistant Chairperson, General Secretary, Secretary, Treasurer/ Assistant Treasurer)
Resolution signed by simple majority specifying who is authorized to act on behalf of the informal association
Document establishing authority to act on behalf of the association (e.g., mandate, power of attorney)
Should the association have a related party that is a legal entity, the formal registration document of that related entity AND the identity documents of the beneficial owners in that entity
Founding document or Constitution in terms of which the entity was founded/ created/ registered
A document indicating the authorised signatories on the legal entity's official letterhead
